mapper.select:
SELECT toc.fUuid AS "uuid", toc.fOperationCombineName AS "operationCombineName", u.fUserName AS "userName", toc.fRemainingAccount AS "remainingAccount", toc.fMaxInvalidCount AS "maxInvalidCount" FROM t_group g LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON u.fLoginName = g.fCreateBy LEFT JOIN t_operation_combine toc ON toc.fUuid = g.fOperationCombineUuid WHERE 1 = 1
AND toc.fOperationCombineName LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.operationCombineName}%'
AND toc.fOperationCombineName > ''
AND g.fGroupName LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.optimizedGroupName}%'
AND toc.fTerminalType = #{groupSettingCriteria.terminalType}
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_group_setting gs WHERE gs.fOperationCombineUuid = toc.fUuid
AND gs.fOperationType > ''
AND gs.fOperationType = #{groupSettingCriteria.operationType}
AND gs.fOperationType IS NULL
)
AND toc.fRemainingAccount > 0
GROUP BY g.fOperationCombineUuid ORDER BY toc.fCreateTime DESC
SELECT g.fGroupName AS 'groupName' FROM t_group g WHERE g.fTerminalType = #{terminalType} GROUP BY g.fGroupName

SELECT g.fGroupName AS 'groupName' FROM t_group g LEFT JOIN t_operation_combine toc ON toc.fUuid = g.fOperationCombineUuid WHERE g.fOperationCombineUuid = #{operationCombineUuid} ORDER BY g.fCreateTime
mapper.insert:
